sentences.english: Russia has long wished to keep the West away from its backyard.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯長久以來都渴望讓西方國家遠離他的後院。

sentences.english: The current conflict might become another drawn-out disaster, like the ones in Afghanistan and Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 目前的戰爭可能會跟伊拉克戰爭阿富汗戰爭一樣長久。

sentences.english: A house full of jade and gold is hard to protect.
sentences.chinese: 滿堂金玉，沒有人能長久保守。

sentences.english: Despite all this, GE failed to save its top-notch credit rating.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，GE還丟掉了長久以來了最高信用等級。

sentences.english: This international award has set the seal on a long and distinguished career.
sentences.chinese: 這項國際獎的授予是對一項長久而崇高的事業的肯定。

sentences.english: Doctors have long advised frequent hand-washing to avoid spreading germs.
sentences.chinese: 醫生長久以來都建議通過勤洗手來減少病毒的傳播。

sentences.english: This will not change - so you need to adopt this habit if you wish to have a long-term relationship.
sentences.chinese: 所以要是你想要同她們長久交往，你需要適應這一點。

sentences.english: In the long run, every market becomes a two -horse race .
sentences.chinese: 長久觀之，每個市場都是二馬之爭的格局。

sentences.english: He is riding high now, but I think this won’t be long.
sentences.chinese: 他現在神氣十足，但我認爲不會長久如此。

sentences.english: Congratulations to you both and may the years ahead bring you continued joy and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 向你倆祝賀，願時間白叟賜賚你們長久的幸福和滿意。

sentences.english: SHORT skirts and cleavage have long been women s weapons.
sentences.chinese: 裙子和低V領長久以爲都是女人的必殺器。

sentences.english: Too long have I been feeling like Lir'schildren.
sentences.chinese: 長久以來，我感覺自己就好像李爾王的孩子。

sentences.english: You can not doubt your own existence.
sentences.chinese: 此種疑團，當不會如此長久存在。

sentences.english: But a lot of Asians want that taste to linger.
sentences.chinese: 但很多亞洲人希望長久回味這一口感。

sentences.english: Life is long because of all the small things. The slow pace.
sentences.chinese: 有了這些小事兒，生命才顯得長久。

sentences.english: You will not live there long but will certainly be destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 你們不能在那地上長久，必盡行除滅。

definition: long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
to maintain/to keep up/to hold together
